Description: Fragment of plain weave, undyed linen cloth with a leaf-shaped tapestry motif (grouped warp threads with crossed and droped threads); Tapestry in linen on ground of purple -coloured wool, design in motif of small trefoil leaves set within the foils of the larger leaf, small bird at centre, undulating stem with dots to either side; Self-bands of grouped threads; Warp: S spun linen, c.17tpc; Weft: S spun linen and Z spun wool, c.13tpc in plain areas and c.36tpc in tapestry; Edges: one rolled hem preceeded by a band of bare warp threads, other edges torn; Sewing: in S spun Z ply linen thread, grouping bare warp threads while hemming
Curator's comments: Unreg. 13; Found in 1988? in a packet in Keeper's Office, previous location cupboard O; Use unknown; Information from Hero Granger-Taylor (1991)
